item.title: Dubai Dilemma: A Spontaneous Adventure of Love and Comfort Zones
item.description: “Wanna meet me in Dubai?” L asked. Jules was in Korea for the first time in 5 years. Pandemic, poverty, the uncomfortable flight seats that make her tailbone hurt for a few days â€“ packing and unpacking that takes forever, Often, she would carry her unpacked luggage from one trip to the next. How about nosy taxi drivers that ask thousands of questions from the airport to home or vice versa?
